CN.content:

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

2. polymers
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 29,34-37 The IDT - based polymers presented deep HOMO levels and hence lead to considerably high V oc of the resulted devices.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. HOMO levels
2. V oc

In this context, HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) levels refer to a property of the polymers, specifically their electronegativity, which affects their ability to transfer electrons. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage) is a property of the devices made from these polymers, which is affected by the HOMO levels of the polymers.

Therefore, HOMO levels and V oc are both "Property Value" entities in this paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, I apologize for the mistake. Here are the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. HOMO levels
2. V oc

The paragraph discusses the effect of HOMO levels on the V oc of devices made from IDT-based polymers. Both HOMO levels and V oc are properties of materials that are relevant to the performance of electronic devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities from the paragraph, presented in the same words as in the original text:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| V oc |
